//: Subgoals that you may want to complete or to keep you busy for some moments.
name: Collect 30 blood

dialogue.offer: Blood... Our main food for darkest centuries. Even I almost forgot its taste, I'd like to drink it again. Bring me 30, too much but it is essential in many ways.
dialogue.accepted: Okay, descendant. This won't be hard and take your time.
dialogue.rejected: If only you let me shoot your chest, this will be done easily.
dialogue.advice: Go to a hospital, get a blood drawn kit, and use it on yourself or your victim.
dialogue.inquire: Drinks? You have the drinks ready?
dialogue.success: These blood certainly are useful. Thanks for this treats, descendant.

dialogue.describe: I want you to slay something...
dialogue.offer: Ofcourse you know about the bloodsucking pests on the swamp, we hate those parasites squirming for blood to live. Hand over 15 of their teeth as a proof to succeed this trial.
dialogue.accepted: Its easy to kill a leech, but don't get bitten: bleeding is much more dangerous than their teeth.
dialogue.advice: They are blind, and depends on what they hear or smell, I think?
dialogue.success: Nice work, I guess they won't bother us for a long time.

name: Take the blood sac from the giant "Thing"

dialogue.describe: This is pretty much risky to you... Going to do it?
dialogue.offer: There is a peculiar cave with vast blood residue in it and I think its their gathering place. This giant "thing" on the depths, you'll need to bring it down as my command.
dialogue.accepted: Bring its blood sac, that would be a nice prize taking it down and as a proof of succeeding this test.
dialogue.advice: It is blind and very slow, slower than a human snail, but it'll devour you and causes deadly injuries getting near it... Now get going!
dialogue.success: Damn kid, that's the mess you wanted to get. And you are still alive after that!
dialogue.failure: Ummm... I want to shoot you.

dialogue.describe: This is the final test I can give you... Still want to try?
dialogue.offer: I've heard that these "blobs" was the cause of all troubles and horrifying events worldwide. As my command, eliminate 200 of these walking corpses to succeed... Later on, I will tell you something after this.
dialogue.accepted: Prepare yourself before jumping into this mess.
dialogue.rejected: Just prepare yourself for this job.
dialogue.success: Hmm... HE appreciates your doings, my comrade. I thank you for your assistance and giving your precious time dealing with these requests I have made for you...
dialogue.success_lie: What good does this do us?
dialogue.failure: It was a lost cause anyways...

dialogue.describe: I want you for this errand.
dialogue.offer: Did you know we have been using blood substitutes for decades? Well, that's a good thing for us. Now, I want you to collect a few human blood, either yours or not... 15, I suppose that will satisfy my pleasure for that taste once again.
dialogue.accepted: You better do this. Sinking my fangs onto your flimsy neck is indeed fatal.
dialogue.rejected: Talk to me again later if you want to help me.
dialogue.advice: Murder someone if you are desperate to collect them.

dialogue.describe: I want you to eradicate something.
dialogue.offer: Leeches are the vile parasites we really hate the most, aside the rampaging resurrected bodies. Kill 50 of these creatures, this would put a stop to those wandering bloodsuckers for a little time.
dialogue.accepted: Good. You may start looking for these parasites anytime you wanted to.
dialogue.advice: Leeches tend to slither in moist areas.
dialogue.inquire: I guess you're not done yet...
dialogue.success: Those leeches would come back later, but thanks anyway.

dialogue.offer: The gravestone in this crypt were built long ago, and the dead bodies been buried here since before I reside here. Surprisingly, they were resurrected with this odd "magic", animating them similar to the city. I want you to take 10 of them down, as they should be peacefully resting in their graves.
dialogue.accepted: Good. Now go outside and look for them.
dialogue.advice: Their blood has calcified into a shell, and it is distinctive to their appearance.
dialogue.success: I know you can do it...

name: Bring a bloodrune
//: Locating a blended overmap in a world would take forever, so we WILL set a pedestal in random distances. RNG is your enemy here.

dialogue.describe: This is a bit hard for you. You still want to try?
dialogue.offer:
Bloodrune... The vampire's eternal soul. Merely a fact that some of us night creatures turn into an object upon death, and most resists to that point.
In the dark days, bloodrunes are set in a pedestal by elder civilizations, and said that their "god" will accept it as a praise, which is not true. Get this rune for me, to honor its soul in a way we normally do.
dialogue.advice: A vampire's death is a big success to those elderly jerks. Well, it is their belief that can't be bothered in any way.
dialogue.success:
I thank you for this rune.
*Shatters it by hand*
dialogue.failure_lie: I shouldn't believe you with this.

dialogue.describe: This is the last job, you want to do it?
dialogue.offer: Since you've been helping me for a while, you need to take me to the vampire cove. Being isolated for centuries is great, but seeing a living community of my kind alleviates my frozen body the most.
dialogue.accepted: Good, those tests proved yourself a good descendant. As a reward, I'll protect you along the way.
dialogue.advice: This may be a long journey. You know I'm a night creature, so you'll have to take care of me.
dialogue.success: I see my kindred seems alright. Well, it doesn't matter if I stay here, my corrupted soul has chosen to follow your deeds...
dialogue.failure_lie: I better have killed you, mortal.

dialogue.describe: Well, actually we have a problem...
dialogue.offer: Our kin isn't a target of diseases, but those 2 vampires at the back, they really look bad and start raging on its own, so we cage them at early state... Never knew the magic was that strong enough to kill EVEN us. I want you to end the sick vampires as your task and get their corrupted bloodrune. We know we can dispose them easily, but our beliefs prevent us from killing our own kind.
dialogue.rejected: You need to do that later.
dialogue.advice: Serious pain you'll get from breaking into their cage.
dialogue.success: Great, mortal. This oozing bloodrune will now meet its place... Or not at all.

dialogue.describe: We do appreciate your assistance with our needs.
dialogue.offer: Vampire bats became literal bloodsuckers these passing days and I want you to hunt down 10 of these vermins. We've been swarmed by these creatures lately but gladly we managed to shove them away.
dialogue.accepted: Good. Come back anytime you want.
dialogue.rejected: I guess you're afraid of bats...
dialogue.advice: Bats are nocturnal, and tends to live in dark places like caves.
dialogue.success: Thank you for your help in eradicating some bloodsuckers.

name: Go to a forgotten burial site

dialogue.describe: Before we go, the trader asked me a request on this journey.
dialogue.offer: The trader told me to check out the old graveyards we knew from the past. So before we go to the outskirts, we'll get pass through it first.
dialogue.advice: Its been a long time since I see those graves...
dialogue.success: The magic took over the buried corpses? That's unfortunate and the trader would be disappointed about this...

dialogue.describe: Are we ready for this trip?
dialogue.offer: We are now going to the outskirts, and I know the commando told you about this place.
dialogue.accepted: Good. Now off we go, mortal.
dialogue.advice: I'll give you some details about the outskirts. It is a large structure with barricaded walls and tents placed outside for human survivors. It also has a barn and farm fields that provides descent food, and shopkeepers sell various stuff there.
dialogue.success: "What else could I do for you" you say? Don't worry, I have no more requests for you. Ask anyone here if you're curious.
